task.title: How to Install a Synology WRX560 Wi-Fi Router (software)
task.shortdesc: After you've installed your router's hardware, it's time to connect to the software!

step.cmd: Connect a wireless device to your router by scanning the QR code provides on [Synology's website](https://www.synology.com/en-us).

Use Synology's default login information to connect to the Wi-Fi network. Synology's default SSID is is "Synology_" and the last 6 digits of your router's serial number, and its default password is "synology" in all lowercase.
step.info: Note: Synology requires you to change this password during the setup process.

step.cmd: Open a web browser on your wireless device and search up either of these URLs: - http://router.synology.com - http://192.168.1.1:8000
Click 'Start' to launch the SRM Setup Wizard.
Read and agree to the Synology End User License Agreement, then click 'next'. Repeat with the Privacy Statement.
Set up your administrator account by filling in the necessary information.
Set up your Wi-Fi network with the necessary information. Wait for the Setup Wizard to finish the setup. This may take up to three minutes.
Sign in to SRM with your newly set-up administrator account.
